==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Habachi:''' Unauthorized personnel are prohibited from entering the warehouse.
:{{DIcon}} What's the deal with this warehouse?
::'''Habachi:''' As the name indicates, this is where we store goods that fall under the public trust here in Aaru Village. There's nothing else to be said about it.
::'''Habachi:''' But if you keep asking me these questions, don't blame me for suspecting you of ulterior motives.
:{{DIcon}} Well, I'll leave you to it.
::'''Habachi:''' As well you should.
{{Dialogue End}}
